method.name: _getvvvv2
method.comment: Returns the version number of the CaveRock.androidsvg library.

method.name: _getvvvv3
_getvvvv4
method.comment: Returns the contents of the {@code <desc>} element in the SVG document. If this element is not available, returns an empty string.

method.name: _getvvvv5
method.comment:
Returns the height of the document As specified In the SVG File.
If the height In the document Is specified In pixels, that value will be returned. If the value Is listed with a physical unit such As "cm", Then the current {@code RenderDPI} value will be used To convert that value To pixels. If the height Is missing, OR In a form which can't be converted to pixels, such as "100%" for example, -1 will be returned.

method.name: _getvvvv6
method.comment: Returns the SVG version number As provided In the root {@code <SVG>} tag of the document. If this element is not available, returns an empty string.

method.name: _getvvvv7
method.comment: Returns the contents of the {@code <title>} element in the SVG document. If this element is not available, returns an empty string.

method.name: _vv6
_getvvvv0
method.comment:
Returns the width of the document As specified In the SVG File.
If the width In the document Is specified In pixels, that value will be returned. If the value Is listed with a physical unit such As "cm", Then the current {@code RenderDPI} value will be used To convert that value To pixels. If the width Is missing, OR In a form which can't be converted to pixels, such as "100%" for example, -1 will be returned.

method.name: _getvvvvv1
_initialize
method.comment: Initializes the SVG object. The SVG will be loaded from a file in the assets folder. @param SVGFileInAssets Its the full name of the file Example: Dim MySVG As ioxSVG MySVG.Initialize("tiger.svg")
